text: Stephanie Charles (born May 24, 1979) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Nyla Payne in Tyler Perry's The Paynes. ==Career== In 2018, she played the role of Nyla Payne on the OWN sitcom, Tyler Perry's The Paynes.
